value.title: Where can I find more about accessibility?
Which assistive technologies support Firefox and Thunderbird?
value.content: Assistive Technology Compatibility - Documents assistive technologies for Windows, Linux, UNIX, macOS and the degree of compatibility with Firefox

value.title: What can I do to make sure my Mozilla extensions are accessible?
value.content: Make sure your extension follows the regular web page accessibility principles.

value.title: I'm interested in helping promote the fine accessibility features that Firefox provides, what can I do?
value.content: Join the Firefox Accessibility Advocates
